songs.title: Music to Drive By
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Candice Pillay]
Go 'head baby
Dem Jointz, you're killing 'em baby
Uh, go 'head baby
Pharmacy you're killing it baby
Uh, go 'head baby
Stand up if you're feeling it baby
Uh, go 'head baby
Dem Jointz, you're killing it baby

[Hook: Dem Jointz]
All the sounds in my head
It's music to my ears
Gunshots are ringing
The melody brings me to tears
And the (?) in the air and it's scaring all the kids
This is music to drive by, you know what it is

[Verse: Dr. Dre (Slim The Mobster)]
They say the shit that I say is a misdemeanor
And some of the shit I say, I can say it cleaner
But everything you say results in no believers
So your opinion can kiss the tip of my fucking penis
It's so vulgar, so inappropriate
Business man from the hood, billionaires is his associates
Don't get it twisted, got killers just a mile from here
(You know you done fucked up, don't you?)

[Hook]
